body: This is a simple, unadorned spellbook. Notes on improving the efficiency of each spell crowd the margins, most of them hopelessly misguided.
name: Unnamed Journal (Level 3 Universalist)

sections.body:
2nd—fox's cunning, scorching ray

1st—alarm, feather fall, obscuring mist, mount, shield, shocking grasp, silent image, sleep
sections.name: Spells
